item.description:
New Phyrexia is here! Untapped Games will be having a $21.00 sealed deck tournament to celebrate! Each player will be given 6 boosters evenly split between New Phyrexia & Scars of Mirrodin to build a deck. Prize pool is based on attendance.

Visit UntappedGames.com/store_location for how to find us! Untapped Games will also have plenty of New Phyrexia product and singles available for sale. Booster packs will be just $3.49 each or 3 for $10.00 and booster boxes are only $87.95 each!
item.why: New Phyrexia is here! Untapped Games will be having a $21.00 sealed deck tournament to celebrate! Each player will be given 6 boosters evenly split between New Phyrexia & Scars of Mirrodin to build a deck. Prize pool is based on attendance.
item.name: MTG New Phyrexia Release Sealed Deck
